short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to help Salesforce users export their contacts in a CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is the best and fastest way to export all of your contacts from Salesforce into a CSV, updated to work with the new lightning interface with no hassle. 

The simple steps to use it are:
1. Install the extension
2. Go to your Salesforce Contacts Page
3. Find the "Export" button
4. Click the button and download the CSV to see all of your contacts!
